name: Honey baby
description: game contentControl an elastic ball and click with the mouse to destroy the bricks under the ball. When all the bricks are destroyed, you can pass! While destroying the brick, you also need to pay attention not to touch the black part of the brick. If you accidentally touch the small ball, you will be damaged and have to start again.featuresThe number of bricks to be destroyed will increase with the increase of levels, and there will be more and more black parts. Come and challenge your limit level.
